CustomField.description: Indicates which approval flow to run for Non-Standard bids, except T&C Type "Gov't/Design Build" and T&C clauses (see CAPEX/T&Cs)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates which approval flow to run for Non-Standard bids, except T&C Type "Gov't/Design Build" and T&C clauses (see CAPEX/T&Cs)
CustomField.label: Approval Flow: Non-STD Bid Set
